member.name: M:FacialRecognition.MAUI.IFacial.RegisterNewImage(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.INavigation)
member.summary:
Ask for photo and register the new image as Data for the SDK recognition, returns any object with the parameters:
- recognitionImage: byte[]
- bruteImage: string (base64)

member.name: M:FacialRecognition.MAUI.IFacial.RegisterFromData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Register the data recognition manually, the data is received from RegisterNewImage function

member.name: M:FacialRecognition.MAUI.IFacial.RegisterFromImageBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary:
Check if image has facial and then translate it to be a Data for the SDK recognition and save it
Will return a byte array for the data, and will throw Exception if the image don't have a face

member.name: M:FacialRecognition.MAUI.IFacial.PerformAnalyze(Microsoft.Maui.Controls.INavigation)
member.summary: Asks for a photo and performs analyze to verify the face integrity of the 2 images, the registred one and the taked photo

member.name: M:FacialRecognition.MAUI.IFacial.PerformAnalyzeFromImageBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Performs a analyze with the registred data and the image bytes to check the integrity of the 2 images, will return true if the two faces of the image is the same person false if not

member.name: E:FacialRecognition.MAUI.Platforms.Android.CameraActivity.Closed
member.summary:
Register: Returns any object with the parameters:
- recognitionImage: byte[]
- bruteImage: string (base64) Analyzes: Returns true if Recognition is the same from registred and false if not the same

member.name: F:FacialRecognition.MAUI.Platforms.Android.CameraActivity.cameraBusy
member.summary: If cameraBusy is true all functions will do nothing

member.name: M:FacialRecognition.MAUI.Platforms.Android.Interface.GenerateFacialRecognitionInterface
member.summary: Creates the facial recognition interfaces for android devices
